item.description:
Sorry we cannot accommodate everyone interested in attending the event.  However, we will be live tweeting the event under the hashtag #MASSMOBILE.

We'll be talking about recent developments plus tips & tricks for developing on iOS, Android and other mobile platforms. Our agenda is: 

  • What's new in iOS 5.0
  • Honeycomb and Android tablet development
  • Developing HTML5 apps

*The event will run until 8:30 pm and pizza will be provided*
item.how_to_find_us: Kendall/MITstop on the Redline, entrance is directly accross from Cosi
item.name: Mobile Developers Meetup 8 - Which Platform to Develop For?
